page.title: 06A SCHOOL DAY IN TILBURY
page.content: My name is Keirsty. I have lived in Tilbury all my life. I was born in 1975 so I am ten this year. I go to { {Manor Junior}School. I am in the third year and my teacher's name is Mrs Grant. We go in class at 8.55 am. We start work until 10.15 am then we go out to play. Assembly lasts from 10.30 to 11.00 am. After assembly we go back to class for more work. At 12.00 it is lunch-time. You can have school dinners, sandwiches or go home. We go into class again at 1.15 pm and we do more work. At 3.00 pm we stop work and tidy up. If we have any spare time we do plays and comedy sketches. The bell goes at 3.05 pm and we all go home. There are 29 of us in class 11, some are third years like me and some are fourth years.
